page.title: 07ST.SAMPSON'S HARBOUR/ADMIN.
page.content: The harbour was originally built to take{granite}to England and now is used for importing goods.The harbour has been in use for 150 years. It is a tidal harbour with ships entering and leaving 1\ hrs.before to 1\hrs.after high water.In the winter pleasure boats and fishing boats go up onto boat parking areas or slipways so that they can be painted or repaired.They hold a{regatta}at the harbour each summer,and sometimes it is used for Nautocross meetings(old cars raced on the sand).All the people at St.Sampson's harbour are employed by the{States of Guernsey.}There are 2 full time crane drivers, 1 watchman on duty and 2 full time harbour attendants.Mr.Trebert has been the harbour master for the past 7 years.
